casebody.data:
HORRY
v.
WOODBURY. No. 198A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 12, 2008. Travis K. Morton, Raleigh, for Joseph Horry.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of June 2008 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Woodbury) shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of June 2008."
